text: A&E; was a Spanish and Portuguese basic cable and satellite television channel that features reality television programming produced by A&E; USA, owned by The History Channel Iberia joint venture between A&E; Networks and AMC Networks International Iberia. It has feeds in Spanish available in Spain, and feeds in Portuguese available in Portugal and Africa. On April 18, 2018, it was replaced by the Iberian version of Blaze.https://mag.sapo.pt/tv/atualidade-tv/artigos/quem-se-atreve-a-conhecer- o-blaze-o-novo-canal-com-fogo-energia-e-chispa (In Portuguese)https://www.rapidtvnews.com/2018041351660/amc-launches-blaze-in- spain.html#axzz5Cmzxo54Q ==References== Category:Portuguese-language television stations Category:Television channels and stations established in 2005 Category:Television stations in Portugal
title: A&E (Spanish and Portuguese TV channel)
